```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(sparklyr)
```

## Setting up sparklyr

- Install Spark
    - Can be done via sparklyr::spark_install or homebrew
    - Available preinstalled on AWS EC2 / EMR
- Create a Spark configuration file

## The Spark Session

```{r sparklyr}
library(sparklyr)

conf <- spark_config("~/sc.yml")

sc <- spark_connect(master = "yarn",
                    spark_home = "/usr/lib/spark",
                    config = conf)


```
